scripts.release:patch: npm run check:clean && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && npm run postversion
scripts.release:minor: npm run check:clean && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && npm run postversion
scripts.release:major: npm run check:clean && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && npm run postversion
scripts.check:clean: git diff --exit-code && git diff --cached --exit-code || (echo 'Error: Working directory is not clean. Please commit or stash your changes.' && exit 1)
